stripped_text: Subroutine Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Subroutine You may pay 1 credit. If you do not, the Runner breaches R&D. They cannot access cards in the root of R&D during that breach.
text:
[subroutine] Look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.
[subroutine] You may pay 1[credit]. If you do not, the Runner breaches R&D. They cannot access cards in the root of R&D during that breach.
title: Shiro
